data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cui, Weina, Yang, Ding (2010): Two new species and two new synonyms of Systropus Wiedemann, 1820 from Palaearctic China (Diptera: Bombyliidae). Zootaxa 2619: 14-26, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.198040
